Interface UbuduMeshManager

    Class describing the ubudu mesh manager

      • start

      • stop

        Call this method to stop scanning for nearby mesh nodes

      • sendMeshMessage

        void sendMeshMessage(java.lang.String meshMessage,
                     java.lang.Integer meshId,
                     java.lang.String networkUUID)
        Send mesh message to specific mesh node in networkUUID
        Parameters:
        meshMessage - message to send (up to 16 bytes).
        meshId - receiver mesh device id in dex format. Should be between 1 - 32767
        networkUUID - networkUUID of the mesh @param meshId should be part of the network.

      • sendMeshMessage

        void sendMeshMessage(java.lang.String meshMessage,
                     java.lang.Integer meshId,
                     java.lang.String networkUUID,
                     boolean shouldDisconnectAfterSending)
        Send mesh message to specific mesh node in networkUUID
        Parameters:
        meshMessage - message to send (up to 16 bytes).
        meshId - receiver mesh device id in dex format. Should be between 1 - 32767
        networkUUID - networkUUID of the mesh @param meshId should be part of the network.
        shouldDisconnectAfterSending - set to true if you want to disconnect from beacon immeadiatly fter sending a mesh message

      • sendMeshMessage

        void sendMeshMessage(java.lang.String meshMessage,
                     java.lang.Integer meshId,
                     java.lang.String networkUUID,
                     boolean shouldDisconnectAfterSending,
                     boolean shouldWaitForAck)
        Send mesh message to specific mesh node in networkUUID
        Parameters:
        meshMessage - message to send (up to 16 bytes).
        meshId - receiver mesh device id in dex format. Should be between 1 - 32767
        networkUUID - networkUUID of the mesh @param meshId should be part of the network.
        shouldDisconnectAfterSending - set to true if you want to disconnect from beacon immeadiatly fter sending a mesh message
        shouldWaitForAck - if true, manager will be waiting for ACK

        void connectToClosestBeacon()
        Automatically connect to the closest connectable and mesh enabled beacon

      • setMonitoringBetweenScanPeriods

        void setMonitoringBetweenScanPeriods(long foregroundPeriod,
                                     long backgroundPeriod)
        Sets the periods between bluetooth scans for foreground state and background state during monitoring.
        Parameters:
        foregroundPeriod - bluetooth scans foreground period (ms)
        backgroundPeriod - bluetooth scans background period (ms)

      • setRangingBetweenScanPeriods

        Parameters:
        foregroundPeriod - between bluetooth scans foreground period (ms)
        backgroundPeriod - between bluetooth scans background period (ms)

        backgroundPeriod - bluetooth scans background period (ms)
